heading: pucker power
subheading: an estimated 6,000 belarussians marked st. valentine's day with a simultaneous kiss that organizers said would land them a place in the guinness book of records. the contestants -- mostly students and other young people -- had set out to beat the previous record set by nearly 3,000 american students in maine. "we're in love," said oleg after a passionate embrace with fellow student irina. "the world has not invented anything better yet."
author: wired staff
text: an estimated 6,000 belarussians marked st. valentine's day with a simultaneous kiss that organizers said would land them a place in the  guinness book of records. the contestants -- mostly students and other young people -- had set out to beat the previous record set by nearly 3,000 american students in maine. "we're in love," said oleg after a passionate embrace with fellow student irina. "the world has not invented anything better yet."
